mapper.select: SELECT region_id, branch_name, branch_address, branch_id, branch_number FROM theater_branch WHERE region_id = #{region_id}
select tb.branch_id, tb.region_id, tb.branch_name from theater_branch tb join region r on tb.region_id = r.region_id where r.region_id= #{region_id}
select s.screen_id , s.screen_location from theater_branch tb join screen s on tb.branch_id = s.branch_id where s.branch_id = #{branch_id};
select m.movie_id , m.movie_name from screen_movie_information smi join movie m on smi.movie_id = m.movie_id where smi.screen_id = #{screen_id}
select branch_id , region_id, branch_name from theater_branch where region_id = #{check}
SELECT branch_img FROM theater_branch WHERE branch_id = #{branch_id}

SELECT tb.branch_name, smi.movie_showing_date, m.movie_name, mg.movie_genre_name, m.movie_running_time, m.movie_production_year, s.screen_location, m.movie_id, s.screen_id, tb.branch_id, s.screen_row * s.screen_line as screen_seat_count FROM screen_movie_information smi JOIN screen s ON smi.screen_id = s.screen_id JOIN movie m ON smi.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN theater_branch tb ON tb.branch_id = s.branch_id JOIN movie_genre mg ON m.movie_genre_id = mg.movie_genre_id WHERE tb.branch_id = #{branch_id} GROUP BY m.movie_name, s.screen_id

SELECT movie_id, MV.movie_genre_id, movie_genre_name, movie_name, movie_running_time, movie_production_year, movie_audience_rating, movie_image, movie_video, director_name, actor_name FROM movie MV join movie_genre MG ON MV.movie_genre_id = MG.movie_genre_id where movie_id = #{movie_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO screen_movie_information(movie_id, screen_id, branch_id, movie_showing_date, movie_showing_time) VALUES (#{movie_id}, #{screen_id}, #{branch_id}, #{movie_showing_date}, #{movie_showing_time})
mapper.select: select TIME_FORMAT(movie_showing_time, '%H:%i') as movie_showing_time, movie_id , branch_id , screen_id from screen_movie_information
SELECT branch_id, region_id, branch_name, branch_address, branch_number, branch_img FROM theater_branch
SELECT screen_id, branch_id, screen_location, screen_row, screen_line FROM screen WHERE branch_id = #{branch_id}
